attributes.action: scrap the idea of additional 'Pay as you Drive' taxation.  As we already pay this tax on fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the motorist already pays a significant proportion of tax on fuel for their vehicles, they in effect are already paying a 'pay as you drive tax'.  We do not wish to be double taxed for the same journey.  
Many people do not have much choice how far they drive to work, and therefore this double taxation would be extremely unfair.
